children.text: Created by a digital marketing generalist, consultant and trainer the site provides downloadable templates and information sheets for small businesses and startups. They even have checklists for success depending on each social media platform specifically. Check out their site

This site is great for SEO (Search Engine Optimization, which also means if your site is easy to find on google), Once you paste your website’s address it gets you started on understanding how your SEO is doing. Click
3. Sprout Social Blog for Social Media Image sizes

Do you ever get annoyed at how the dimensions of images for different platforms are SLIGHTLY different? For example, Instagram has square dimensions, Facebook has tall rectangles and Pinterest has even taller rectangles than Facebook. No worries, this resource would be perfect for you! Sprout Social will help you get the right sizing in their guides. (warning: the site itself is pretty spammy, you get three pop-up ads within seconds on their site but we solemnly swear this resource is useful) Click
to have a look at the guide.
People think you can’t contact Facebook but you can! Visit

and click get started, select the advertising or business account you have then select the issue you are having, fill in the form with details and click start chat. Voila! You’ll be to live chat with a human on Facebook!

Did you find our introductions useful or have something you would like to share? Feel free to contact us on our Instagram, Facebook or LinkedIn at @eprojectsubc. Have you heard? Besides getting eProjects updates on different platforms you also get informed of our events
You get to sign up for events before they are publicly released. How cool is that? Sign up now! I’m sure you don’t want to miss such an amazing opportunity.

post.description: Want to know more about entrepreneur resources for startups or budding entrepreneurs in BC? This is the right post for you! In this post, we will be specifically introducing marketing resources. In case you are not aware of it (you should!!) this is a part of an exclusive series up on our blog! If you want to be kept in the loop of all the amazing blog posts we have lined up, subscribe to our newsletter here!
post.title: Marketing Edition
